!1 Test MP_JobStandar - Standard Job Definitions

Verify standard maintenance job templates.

!include -c TestLoginGardenWorld

----
!2 Count Job Standards

!|Set Variable|
|@JobCount@   |@SQL=SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mp_jobstandar WHERE ad_client_id=11|

!|Assert Variable|
|@JobCount@   |3|

----
!2 Verify Vehicle Oil Change Job

!|Assert Record|
|*Table*         |MP_JobStandar      |
|mp_jobstandar_id|1100001            |
|*Read*          |                   |
|name            |Vehicle Oil Change |
|jobstandartype  |AA                 |
|maintainarea    |ME                 |
|isactive        |Y                  |

----
!2 Verify HVAC Filter Replacement Job

!|Assert Record|
|*Table*         |MP_JobStandar           |
|mp_jobstandar_id|1100002                 |
|*Read*          |                        |
|name            |HVAC Filter Replacement |
|jobstandartype  |AA                      |
|maintainarea    |ME                      |

----
!2 Verify Forklift Battery Service Job

!|Assert Record|
|*Table*         |MP_JobStandar            |
|mp_jobstandar_id|1100003                  |
|*Read*          |                         |
|name            |Forklift Battery Service |
|maintainarea    |EL                       |

----
!2 Verify Job Links to Asset Group

!|Set Variable|
|@AssetGroup@ |@SQL=SELECT name FROM a_asset_group WHERE a_asset_group_id=(SELECT a_asset_group_id FROM mp_jobstandar WHERE mp_jobstandar_id=1100001)|

Asset Group should be defined for the job standard.
